🖱️ Meet Mera: Your AI Browser Assistant 

🔥 Simplify your workflow with Mera, the all-in-one Chrome extension that seamlessly integrates AI into your productivity. 🔥

💪 Key Features:

👉 Voice-to-Text Transformation
✔️ Effortless Email Drafting: Speak your thoughts, and Mera transforms them into clean, professionally formatted email bodies in seconds.
✔️ Dynamic Formatting: Mera processes voice commands, structures text, and pastes it directly into email clients or text fields—ready to send.

👉 Sidebar Shortcuts
✔️ Essential Productivity Tools: Access key actionable shortcuts directly in the Mera side panel:

Coding Assistant
Sending Email 
Chatting with Webpages
Brainstorming Ideas
Searching the Web

👉 Browser Automation
✔️ Task Execution: Use Mera to perform email-related tasks and create/send meeting invites to your contacts—all through chat for seamless workflow management.
✔️ Dynamic Workflow: Automate email drafting and meeting scheduling directly from your browser.

💻 How to Get Started:
🔸 Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin Mera to your toolbar.
🔸 Sign in or create your free account.
🔸 Start simplifying your workflow with Mera today!
